channel.title: Cisco-Packet-Tracer on J.Mwangi Cybersecurity
channel.description: Recent content in Cisco-Packet-Tracer on J.Mwangi Cybersecurity

item.title: Visualizing TCP/IP and OSI Models with Cisco Packet Tracer
item.author: jamesmwang1@proton.me (James Mwangi K)
item.description: Step-by-step analysis of web traffic and TCP/IP protocols using Cisco Packet Tracer. Learn how data encapsulation, port assignments, and protocol interactions operate across OSI layers in a simulated network environment.
